summary: Rachel Carlson, a successful novelist moves to a small Scottish village to move on with her life after the death of her son. Strange things start to happen when she is haunted by ghosts and real life terror.
cast: Demi Moore|Henry Ian Cusick|Jordan El-Balawi|Kate Isitt|Nicholas Gleaves|James Cosmo|Joanna Hole|Therese Bradley|Hans Matheson|Mickey Wilson|Polly Frame|Ceit Kearney|Nichola Bee|Jamie Edgell|Anne Smith|Isla Hampson|Helen Crerar
keywords: sex|accidental drowning|woman in jeopardy|death of a child|author
title: En la tiniebla
